name: NAVY GUNNER BATTLESHIP WAR
description:
NAVY GUNNER BATTLESHIP WAR is the most immersive and realistic 3D battle ship with horrible night environment of helicopter fighting air attack on enemy warships. Be the best sniper shooting hunter and destroy all the naval battleships simulator

Feature:
- Multiple action simulation shooting survival game
- Smooth and realistic helicopter controls
- Battle-filed night war
- Task force action game
